auth-exceptions.invalidEmail: The email address is badly formatted.
auth-exceptions.userNotFound: No user found for the provided email.
auth-exceptions.wrongPassword: Incorrect password provided for this user.
auth-exceptions.emailAlreadyInUse: The email is already associated with an account.
auth-exceptions.operationNotAllowed: This operation is not allowed. Please contact support.
auth-exceptions.signOutFailed: Failed to sign out. Please try again.
auth-exceptions.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
auth-exceptions.passwordsDoNotMatch: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
